outline:
1. freely, for nothing, without cause
    1. gratis, gratuitously, for nothing
    2. for no purpose, in vain
    3. gratuitously, without cause, undeservedly
kjv_def: without a cause (cost, wages), causeless, to cost nothing, free(-ly), innocent, for nothing (nought, in vain.
strongs_def: gratis, i.e. devoid of cost, reason or advantage
